definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="shoot_arrow"><field name="rangeditem">CUSTOM:YamiAdvitaSlash</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Dark Cloaked Avidya Slash</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:AvidyaSlash</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
